price: Mootummaan samii, dachiifi wantoota isaan keessaa kan Rabbiiti. Inni waan hunda irratti danda’aadha.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرُۢ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā fīhinna wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
